remarks: A function on a closed interval with nonzero derivative is one-to-one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvne0.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvne0.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
dvne0.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A [,] B ) -cn-> RR ) ) $.
dvne0.d $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
dvne0.z $e |- ( ph -> -. 0 e. ran ( RR _D F ) ) $.
dvne0f1 $p |- ( ph -> F : ( A [,] B ) -1-1-> RR ) $.
